perturbation.original_text: Payment Date" means: (i) for Merchant Accounts originally covered by the TS ISO Agreement and the PCS ISO Agreement, the [***] day (or first Business Day thereafter if such day is not a Business Day) of each calendar month during the term of this Agreement; and (ii) for all other Merchant Accounts on the FDMS "Omaha" platform covered by this Agreement, the first Business Day after the day the funds are available and in Bank's settlement account, but in no event later than [***] [***] days after the end of each month.
perturbation.changed_text: "Payment Date" means: (i) for Merchant Accounts originally covered by the TS ISO Agreement and the PCS ISO Agreement, the [***] day (or first Business Day thereafter if such day is not a Business Day) of each calendar month during the term of this Agreement; and (ii) for all other Merchant Accounts on the FDMS "Omaha" platform covered by this Agreement, the first Business Day after the day the funds are available and in Bank's settlement account, but in no event later than five (5) business days after the end of each month.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces an in-text contradiction by altering the payment deadline for Merchant Accounts on the FDMS "Omaha" platform. The original text states that payments are due no later than [***] [***] days after the end of each month, while the modified text shortens this period to five (5) business days after the end of each month. This creates ambiguity regarding the correct payment deadline, leading to potential disputes over contractual obligations.

perturbation.original_text: ISO shall collect completed and signed Application Materials and Merchant Processing Agreements from Applicants and shall forward them to SERVICERS within [***] [***] Business Days after the merchant is boarded (which may be accessed by SERVICERS online or forwarded to SERVICERS via ISO's automated application system or to a facsimile number designated by SERVICERS, provided such complies with the Rules and applicable laws, rules and regulations) or to any other place(s) as SERVICERS may designate for processing and document storage.
perturbation.changed_text: ISO shall collect completed and signed Application Materials and Merchant Processing Agreements from Applicants and shall forward them to SERVICERS within ten (10) Business Days after the merchant is boarded (which may be accessed by SERVICERS online or forwarded to SERVICERS via ISO's automated application system or to a facsimile number designated by SERVICERS, provided such complies with the Rules and applicable laws, rules and regulations) or to any other place(s) as SERVICERS may designate for processing and document storage.
perturbation.explanation: By changing the timeframe within which ISO has to provide the application material, we create a contradiction between the original period of [***] [***] Business Days to ten (10) Business Days. The uncertainty in the enforcement that is generated can create disputes over contractual obligations.

perturbation.original_text: ISO shall make available (whether through public filings or directly) SERVICERS with annual audited financial statements prepared by an independent auditing firm within 90 days of the end of each fiscal year (and shall make available to SERVICERS quarterly financial statements upon request of SERVICERS). In addition, ISO will provide any shareholder/owner personal financial information as required by the Rules. ISO will, at any and all reasonable times, permit SERVICERS' employees, agents and/or auditors to inspect ISO's books and records at SERVICERS' expense prior request and notice and if for a particular need.
perturbation.changed_text: ISO shall make available (whether through public filings or directly) SERVICERS with annual audited financial statements prepared by an independent auditing firm within 120 days of the end of each fiscal year (and shall make available to SERVICERS quarterly financial statements upon request of SERVICERS). In addition, ISO will provide any shareholder/owner personal financial information as required by the Rules. ISO will, at any and all reasonable times, permit SERVICERS' employees, agents and/or auditors to inspect ISO's books and records at ISO's expense prior request and notice and if for a particular need.
perturbation.explanation: By changing the timeframe within which ISO has to provide the annual financial statements, we create a contradiction between the original period of 90 days to 120 days, creating a contradictory deadlines. We also altered the expense attribution from the SERVICERS to the ISO.
